summary.para: The PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER structure contains information about a custom paper size for a PostScript driver. This structure is used with the GET_PS_FEATURESETTING printer escape function.

remarks.para: For the semantics of the lOrientation, lWidth, lHeight, lWidthOffset, and lHeightOffset members, please refer to "Custom Page Size Parameters" in "PostScript Printer Description File Format Specification" v.4.3.

summary.para: Indicates the custom paper orientation. This member can be 0 to 3 if custom page size is selected. Otherwise, it is 1 and all other structure members are zero
Custom page width offset, in points.
Custom page height offset, in points.
